attributes.review:
this app ruined my life. when you download it it begins to track you location, which allows them to sell your information. my information was sold to the worst of the worst, which was only the beginning of a series of unfortunate events. 
1. my car was tampered with. i woke up one morning to go to church (being a christian, of course) only to find that my mirrors had been turned. this seems minor, but caused me to be late! this has continued to happen every single night, meaning i‚Äôm always late.
2. i lost my job. after having to stop and fix my mirrors every morning, i gained a reputation at work. after several late mornings, my boss called me into his office. i was fired.
3. i lost my wife. no woman wants a jobless and depressed man. one thing led to another and i‚Äôm signing divorce papers on a gloomy sunday morning.
4. i lost my home and children. my wife took everything and left me to the streets. my only possessions were my dog and two breath mints that i had in my pocket. i became homeless.
at this point i was living on the streets. i‚Äôm grateful that my family was not hurt by the people tampering with my car. my wife may have left me, but i loved her. i found things to be grateful for, i found happiness.
and then they took my dog.
these muddling thieves took everything from me through to their petty crimes, but this one was personal. this one cut deep. 
i lost all of my happiness then. i lost my will to live.
this app seems to be a great way to follow up with the campaign of our fearless leader, but it‚Äôs a foil.  it‚Äôs a way to steal your information and sell it for profit. 
please, save yourself. don‚Äôt put yourself through what i did.
attributes.title: Ruined My Life
